00013 MainWindow::MainWindow()
00014     : KParts::MainWindow()
00015 {
00016     _d.reset(new MainWindowPrivate(this));
00017     _d->addDockBar(Qt::TopToolBarArea);
00018     _d->addDockBar(Qt::LeftToolBarArea);
00019     _d->addDockBar(Qt::BottomToolBarArea);
00020     _d->addDockBar(Qt::RightToolBarArea);
00021 }

00026 
00027 void
00028 MainWindow::addDock(Qt::ToolBarArea area, Aki::DockWidget* dock)
00029 {
00030     Q_ASSERT(dock);
00031 
00032     if (area == Qt::NoToolBarArea) {
00033         return;
00034     }
00035 
00036     QList<KToolBar*> tbl = toolBars();
00037     foreach (KToolBar* bar, tbl) {
00038         if (toolBarArea(bar) == area) {
00039             qobject_cast<Aki::DockBar*>(bar)->addDock(dock);
00040         }
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 QMenu*
00045 MainWindow::createPopupMenu()
00046 {
00047     return 0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void
00051 MainWindow::removeDock(Aki::DockWidget* dock)
00052 {
00053     // Loop through all the toolbars.
00054     QList<KToolBar*> tbl = toolBars();
00055     foreach (KToolBar* bar, tbl) {
00056         // Attempt at casting to the DockBar.
00057         Aki::DockBar* dockBar = qobject_cast<Aki::DockBar*>(bar);
00058         /* Check and see if it is valid because if the user added more dockbars of their own
00059            hopefully it will fail here. */
00060         if (dockBar) {
00061             // So we got a valid DockBar and now we loop through all the actions.
00062             QList<QAction*> al = dockBar->actions();
00063             foreach (QAction* action, al) {
00064                 // Now cast for the DockButton which holds the dock.
00065                 Aki::DockButton* widget =
00066                     qobject_cast<Aki::DockButton*>(dockBar->widgetForAction(action));
00067                 // Check and see if the widget is valid.
00068                 if (widget) {
00069                     // Check and see if the dock is part of this action button.
00070                     if (widget->dock() == dock) {
00071                         dockBar->removeAction(action);
00072                         return;
00073                     }
00074                 }
00075             }
00076         }
00077     }
00078 }
00079

00081 MainWindow::setTopRightCorner(Aki::ViewTabBar* widget)
00082 {
00083     Q_ASSERT(widget);
00084     _d->setTopRightCorner(widget);

00099 void
00100 MainWindow::setView(Aki::View* view)
00101 {
00102     _d->view = view;
00103     setCentralWidget(_d->view);
00104 
00105     connect(_d->cornerWidget, SIGNAL(moveTab(int,int)),
00106             _d->view, SLOT(viewPositionChanged(int,int)));
00107     connect(_d->cornerWidget, SIGNAL(tabCloseRequested(int)),
00108             _d->view, SLOT(viewPositionClose(int)));
00109     connect(_d->cornerWidget, SIGNAL(currentChanged(int)),
00110             _d->view, SLOT(viewCurrentChanged(int)));
00111 }
00112 
00113 Aki::View* MainWindow::view()

00116 }
